$interpreted: Sherlock: Should be around here...
Lisa: ...Didn't you say that I only have to dance and gather customers for you?
Sherlock: A customer paid a really good price to purchase Rainbow Roses. An extra pair of eyes is helpful. The quicker we find it, the quicker I can go home.
Lisa: Rainbow Roses?
Sherlock: You don't know? It's a type of rose that only needs a small amount of water to thrive.
Sherlock: With the proper care, they can stay in bloom for an entire lifetime!
Sherlock: The Rainbow Roses are a rare species that usually grows here.
Sherlock: However, the recent war between the Desert Kingdom and Kingdom of the Sun has ravaged this place. I have no idea if we can actually find them here...
Lisa: I know where they might be.
Sherlock: What! How would you know?
Lisa: Follow me.
Sherlock: No kidding, they really are Rainbow Roses? How did you know that you can find them here?
Lisa: ...The village I used to live in; there were a lot of Rainbow Roses here before...
Sherlock: The village you used to live in? So, is this where...?
Lisa: The war has been going on for a while. Everyone either ran away or died because of the war. Even the Rainbow Roses barely survived...
Sherlock: So, does this mean that...
Sherlock: The Rainbow Roses are even rarer now? Awesome, then I can sell them at an even higher price!
Sherlock: Hey you, grab the flower. Time to greet the buyer and complete this deal!
Sherlock: Wasn't this the scheduled time for our meeting? Why is he nowhere to be seen...
Male Noble: Hey~~
Sherlock: Oh, Sir, you're here at last? The Rainbow Roses you requested...
Male Noble: Help...ugh!
Sherlock: Hey! Don't you dare mess with my client!
Sherlock: The desert is dangerous, don't wander around like this! If you're going to get yourself killed, at least do it after you paid...
Sherlock: Ah, no good. I should search his body to see if he actually brought money.
Lisa: ...Hmmm, the Rainbow Roses...what should we do with them?
Sherlock: Hmm...lemme think...
Sherlock: Hmph, his wallet is nowhere to be found. Must've lost it when he was running away in panic...
Lisa: ...Thank you...
Sherlock: Huh? Are you talking to me?
Lisa: Yes. Thank you for gifting the Rainbow Roses to me...
Sherlock: Plants like that are hard to find buyers for anyway. Since it was something that came from your village, you can keep it as a souvenir.
Sherlock: However, that counts as your salary for the month~
